review: Such a nice doctor and friendly explanation about about the issue. He treated the patient very well and explained the advantage and disadvantage in a simple terms

CBC test price was very high than normal. ****** *** ******* ***** ***** ***** he was forcing to admit. No proper diagnosis and suggestions. Have been visited to lots of doctors through practo app. But this experience was not good.
Doctor Mriglani is very friendly and understands the problems in depth.  I recommend his consultation
I will highly recommend Dr Pratyush Miglani, patiently listens , very well explains the root cause , plans the treatment seamlessly, I had very amazing experience! Thank you doctor sir !
